name: InfantAbcdHcpPipeline
description: The Developmental Cognition and Neuroimaging (DCAN) Labs fMRI Pipeline. This BIDS application initiates a functional MRI processing pipeline built upon the Human Connectome Project's minimal processing pipelines. The application requires only a dataset conformed to the BIDS specification, and little-to-no additional configuration on the part of the user. BIDS format and applications are explained in detail at http://bids.neuroimaging.io/
command-line: mkdir -p opt_freesurfer || exit 2; ln -f -s /opt/freesurfer/* opt_freesurfer/ || exit 2; cp -rL [FREESURFER_LICENSE] opt_freesurfer/license.txt || exit 2; export FREESURFER_HOME=$PWD/opt_freesurfer; source /SetupEnv.sh || exit 2; source ${FREESURFER_HOME}/SetUpFreeSurfer.sh || exit 2; bash mk_fake_bids [SUBJECT_DIR] FakeBids && python3 /app/run.py FakeBids $PWD/infant-abcd-results-[SUBJECT_DIR] --freesurfer-license=$PWD/opt_freesurfer/license.txt [ASEG] [ATROPOS_MASK_METHOD] [ATROPOS_RANGE_LOWER] [ATROPOS_RANGE_UPPER] [BANDSTOP_LOWER] [BANDSTOP_UPPER] [DCMETHOD] [HYPER_NORMALIZATION_METHOD] [JLF_METHOD] [MAX_CORTICAL_THICKNESS] [MOTION_CONTROL_FRAME] [MULTI_MASKING_DIR] [MULTI_TEMPLATE_DIR] [NO_CROP] [SESSION_ID] [SMOOTHING_ITERATIONS] [SUBCORTICAL_MAP_METHOD] [T1_BRAIN_MASK] [T1_STUDY_TEMPLATE_HEAD] [T1_STUDY_TEMPLATE_BRAIN] [T2_STUDY_TEMPLATE_HEAD] [T2_STUDY_TEMPLATE_BRAIN] [ANAT_ONLY] [IGNORE_FUNC] [CUSTOM_CLEAN] [FILE_MAPPER_JSON] [CHECK_OUTPUTS_ONLY] [IGNORE_EXPECTED_OUTPUTS] --ncpus 8 [STAGES]

groups.description: Optional arguments to run infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline. Some may actually be required where as others change default functionality. Sorted alphabetically
groups.name: Optional Arguments

groups.description: Special pipeline options which pertain to an alternative pipeline or an extra stage which is not inferred from the inputted BIDS data.
groups.name: Special Pipeline Options

groups.description: Runtime options which change runtime behaviors. Debugging features.
groups.name: Runtime Options

inputs.description: Input BIDS subject folder
inputs.name: Input BIDS subject folder

inputs.description: To run FreeSurfer a license file must exist and be pointed to. The license can be acquired by filling out this form: https://surfer.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/registration.html.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline freesurfer license

inputs.description: Specify path to the aseg file to be used by FreeSurfer.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline aseg

inputs.description: We create a mask (T1w_acpc_brain_mask.nii.gz) near the top of PreFreeSurfer. Later, we refine the mask using atropos. In some cases we just want to use the mask that atropos creates during the refinement step to overwrite the original mask. To do that, set this option to CREATE. Other times, we may want to keep the mask as-is, in which case, use NONE. Tip: for neos, use REFINE; for older babies (8+?) use CREATE. Default: REFINE.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline atropos mask method

inputs.description: Lower range to be used for atropos labeling. Defaults: 4.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline atropos lower range

inputs.description: Upper range to be used for atropos labeling. Defaults: 4.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline atropos lower range

inputs.description: Parameters for motion regressor band-stop filter. It is recommended for the boundaries to match the inter-quartile range for participant group respiratory rate (bpm), or to match bids physio data directly. These parameters are highly recommended for data acquired with a frequency of approx 1 Hz or more (TR<=1.0). Default: no filter
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline atropos lower bandstop

inputs.description: Parameters for motion regressor band-stop filter. It is recommended for the boundaries to match the inter-quartile range for participant group respiratory rate (bpm), or to match bids physio data directly. These parameters are highly recommended for data acquired with a frequency of approx 1 Hz or more (TR<=1.0). Default: no filter
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline atropos upper bandstop

inputs.description: Specify a distortion correction method. Default: use auto-detection.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline atropos distortion correction method

inputs.description: Specify the intensity profiles to use the hyper-normalization step in FreeSurfer. ADULT_GM_IP adjusts the entire base image such that the IP of GM in the target rougly matches the IP of GM of the reference (i.e., the adult freesurfer atlas). The the WM in the reference. ROI_IPS adjusts the intensity profiles of each ROI (GM, WM, CSF) separately and reassembles the parts. NONE skips hyper-normalization step. This allows the user to run PreFreeSurfer, apply new, experimental hyper-normalization methods and then restart at FreeSurfer. Default: ADULT_GM_IP.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline hyper normalization method

inputs.description: Specify method to use to perform joint label fusion. Default: T1W.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline joint label fusion method

inputs.description: Maximum cortical thickness to allow in FreeSurfer. Default: 5mm.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline max cortical thickness

inputs.description: Frame to be used when computing motion-control values. This choosing different frame to see what works best for a run. In future, will add an algorithm to determine best frame(s). Default: 17.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline motion control frame

inputs.description: Directory for joint label fusion masks.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline multi masking dir

inputs.description: Directory for multi template dir.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline multi template dir

inputs.description: Alignment in PreFreeSurfer does neck/shoulder cropping. Some images do not have neck and shoulders, so do not want this cropping to happen. This option allows user to turn that off.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline no crop

inputs.description: Filter input dataset by session id. Default is all ids found under the subject input directory(s). A session id does not include 'ses'.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline session_id

inputs.description: Tell FreeSurfer how many smoothing iterations to run. Default: 10 iterations.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline smoothing iterations

inputs.description: Specify method to use to align subcorticals. Default: ROI_MAP.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline subcortical map method

inputs.description: Specify the path to the mask file. The file specified will replace T1w_acpc_brain_mask.nii.gz. Tip: when supplying a brain-mask, you may want to set --atropos-mask-method to NONE. Default: mask generate by PreFreeSurfer.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline subcortical T1 brain mask

inputs.description: T1w template head images for intermediate nonlinear registration, effective where population differes greatly from average adult, e.g. in elderly populations with large ventricles.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline subcortical t1 study template

inputs.description: T1w template brain images for intermediate nonlinear registration, effective where population differes greatly from average adult, e.g. in elderly populations with large ventricles.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline subcortical t1 study template

inputs.description: T2w template head images for intermediate nonlinear registration, effective where population differs greatly from average adult, e.g. in elderly populations with large ventricles.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline subcortical t2 study template

inputs.description: T2w template brain images for intermediate nonlinear registration, effective where population differs greatly from average adult, e.g. in elderly populations with large ventricles.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline subcortical t2 study template

inputs.description: Ignore functional files (process anatomy files only). This option must be set in order to process subjects for which no functional data was collected.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline subcortical anat only

inputs.description: Ignore functional files (process anatomy files only). This option must be set in order to process subjects for which no functional data was collected.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline subcortical anat only

inputs.description: Runs DCAN cleaning script after the pipeline completes successfully to delete pipeline outputs based on the file structure specified in the custom-clean JSON. Required for the custom clean stage.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline custom clean

inputs.description: Runs dcan file-mapper after the pipeline completes successfully, to copy pipeline outputs to BIDS-formatted derivatives files based on te file-mapper json.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline file mapper json

inputs.description: Checks for the existence of outputs for each stage then exit. Useful for debugging.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline check outputs only

inputs.description: Continues pipeline even if some expected outputs are missing.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline ignore expected outputs

inputs.description: Specify a subset of stages to run. If a single stage name is given, the pipeline with be started at that stage. If a string with a ':' is given, a stage name before the ':' will tell run.py where to start and a stage name after the ':' will tell it where to stop. If no ':' is found, the pipeline will start with the stage specified and run to the end.
inputs.name: infant-abcd-hcp-pipeline stages
